en.title: Ragdoll Personality and Characteristics: The Cuddly Large Cat
en.content:
The Ragdoll, whose name means "rag doll," is known for its characteristic trait of going limp when held. With their large size, gentle personality, and beautiful blue eyes, they are popular worldwide.

Ragdoll Personality

Easygoing and Affectionate

Ragdolls have a very easygoing personality and love to be close to their owners. They will climb onto your lap or relax with you on the sofa, cherishing time spent with family above all else.

Gentle with Low Aggression

Ragdolls show very low aggression and interact gently with children and other pets. They are highly popular as a family-friendly cat breed.

Physical Characteristics

Adult males can weigh 7-9 kg, making them a large breed. They have semi-long silky coats and striking blue eyes. Coat patterns include colorpoint, bicolor, and mitted varieties.

zh.title: 布偶猫的性格与特征：喜欢被抱的大型猫
zh.content:
布偶猫（Ragdoll）的名字意为"布娃娃"，其最大特点是被抱起时会全身放松、软绵绵地瘫在怀里。凭借高大的体型、温顺的性格和美丽的蓝色眼睛，在全世界都深受喜爱。

布偶猫的性格

性情温和、爱撒娇

布偶猫性格非常温和，最喜欢依偎在主人身边。它们会爬到你的膝盖上，或者和你一起在沙发上放松，最珍视与家人共度的时光。

温顺、攻击性低

布偶猫攻击性极低，与儿童和其他宠物都能和平相处。作为适合家庭饲养的猫种而广受欢迎。

外形特征

成年公猫体重可达7-9公斤，属于大型猫种。拥有半长毛丝绸般质感的被毛和蓝色眼睛。毛色花纹包括重点色、双色和手套色等。
